Direct Known Subclasses:
AvgNormSearchPenalty
public class NormalisedSearchPenalty
extends SearchPenalty

This SearchPenalty normalises each shortest distance over the maximum and all disjoint nodes

Description copied from class: SearchPenalty
Accumulated penaltyies calcualted by finding the minimum distance from n to any node in other using the oringial ontology (or 'infinity' if there is no path)

penaltyFinal

public double penaltyFinal(int common,
                           int leftOnly,
                           int rightOnly)
Normalise the penalty over the total number of nodes not common Normalise each penalty, and return the average. Will return the normalised sum
